    src/NativeImplement.js

    import { 
    CHANNEL, 
    CHANNEL_MESSAGE, 
    CHANNEL_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE, 
    CHANNEL_NA_DOWSTREAM, 
    CHANNEL_NA_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE 
} from './constants';
import EventEmitter from '@bone/event-emitter';
import logger from '@bone/logger';

const log = logger.create({
    module: 'ChannelNativeBridge',
    label: ['channel', 'bridge']
});

class ChannelNativeBridge {
    static MODULE_NAME = CHANNEL;
    
    constructor({
        bridge,
        nativeBridge
    }){
        // mixin event-emitter for event dispatching
        Object.assign(this, EventEmitter);
        this.bridge = bridge;
        this.nativeBridge = nativeBridge;

        // dispatch native events
        bridge.on(CHANNEL_NA_DOWSTREAM, onMessageArried.bind(this));
        bridge.on(CHANNEL_NA_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE, onConnectStatusChange.bind(this));
    }

    // fake ready
    // it's useful for web initialization
    ready(args, callback){
        // ignore conf cause connection has been established by app
        setTimeout(callback, 0);
    }

    subscribe([topic], callback){
        // listen to local event dispatcher
        // message will be sent through native event CHANNEL_NA_DOWSTREAM
        this.on(topic, callback);
        
        if(this.listenerCount(topic) > 1){
            return;
        }

        // if it's the first listener
        // subscribe to native
        // so that the topic will be passed through native filter
        this.nativeBridge.call(CHANNEL, 'subscribe', [topic], (err)=>{
            if(err){
                log.warn(`subscribe ${topic} failed:`, err);
                throw err;
            }
        });
    }

    unsubscribe([topic], callback){
        this.off(topic, callback);

        if(this.listenerCount(topic) > 0 ){
            return;
        }

        // if listener queue is empty, unsubscribe from native
        this.nativeBridge.call(CHANNEL, 'unsubscribe', [topic], (err)=>{
            if(err){
                log.warn(`unsubscribe ${topic} failed:`, err);
                throw err;
            }
        });
    }

    publish([topic, payload], callback){
        this.nativeBridge.call(CHANNEL, 'publish', [topic, payload], callback);
    }

    request([topic, payload], callback){
        this.nativeBridge.call(CHANNEL, 'request', [topic, payload], callback);
    }
}

function onMessageArried(msg){
    // dispatch events
    // with err=null
    this.emit(msg.topic, msg);
}

function onConnectStatusChange(statusType){
    this.emit(CHANNEL_CONNECT_STATUS_CHANGE, statusType.status);
}

export default ChannelNativeBridge;
